Quote.Speaker: Man
Quote.Text: Next up, secretary Schrute will read the minutes from Sunday's meeting.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Minutes from previous meeting of Knights of the Night. No, Jim, hey!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: This meeting is for Knights of the Night only.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Knights of the Night are volunteer crime patrollers. We're often compared to the Guardian Angels, but we could not be more different from them. Seriously, we are nothing like the Guardian Angels. I mean, broad strokes purposes, sure. Think Guardian Angels. One of our many recent good deeds? We set out to capture the Scranton Strangler. Mission accomplished. Not by us.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I'm actually just looking for my Blackberry, so, carry on.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No, no, no, no, no. I see how this movie ends. You make fun of me, everyone laughs, ha, ha, ha... screw you!

Quote.Speaker: Man
Quote.Text: Dwight, don't be bothered by your friend's presence.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What are you going to do now? Are you going to make fun of our leader's weird voice? Huh? [mimicking the leader's voice] Dwight, don't be bothered by the [mumbles]. Over the line, Jim.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I'm just looking for my phone, so... pretend I'm not here.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Fine. Minutes from previous meeting of Knights of the Night. That's our official name, Jim.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Sounds good.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Reflective strips were glued to patrol jackets. Knights went outside with flashlights to test them.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Smart.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: And the rest was just [mumbles]stuff.

Quote.Speaker: Man
Quote.Text: Go ahead and read it, some people weren't here.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay. Knights stayed outside to play flashlight tag.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh, come on, that sounds awesome.

Quote.Speaker: Member
Quote.Text: It was pretty cool.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Was it?

Quote.Speaker: Member
Quote.Text: It was fun.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: It was pretty awesome.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [answers phone] Hey! Yeah. No, I got it. Just leaving now.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: January three, 2011. A day which will live in-famously. Holly Partridge Flax, otherwise known as Holly, otherwise otherwise known as a living, breathing angel, is engaged to another man. This is freaking me out. I- okay, let's switch to the happy video, okay? No, no, no, no, let's push through. We'll do this.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Today will either be the best or the worst day of my life. Holly gave AJ an ultimatum. He either proposes by New Year's or they break up. Now, if she's engaged, I'm gonna go crazy, and I'm gonna start attacking people. If she's not engaged, in all honesty, I may just burn this whole place to the ground out of happiness. Either way, I am going to need some talking down. And nobody talks me down like myself in a video talking me down.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [filming video] Michael, I know what you're thinking. Holly's engaged to another man, and you want to kill yourself. It may seem like a good idea, but it's not.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [giggles] Snot. Sorry, it sounded like you said it's snot. I am so sorry.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay, so killing yourself. [laughs] I was just thinking about snot.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Good morning.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey, guys! Fun thing. The index cards on your desk are resolution cards. You write your New Year's resolution on them, I'll collect them, and then display them on... da-da-da-da-da! This! Resolution board.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Wow. Did your baby draw that?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: The glitter is blinding.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: I think it's good.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: It's gonna be fun.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I recently met Sue, the office administrator at Vance Refrigeration. She has this awesome wall full of fun initiatives and morale boosters and stuff. Sue just goes for it, she's awesome.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: I know Sue. She's not that great. And you know her husband's in a wheelchair, right?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Okay, champagne.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Happy.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Sponge.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Sad. To soak up my tears.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Gummi bears and gummi worms.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Bears sad, worms happy. Come on, Erin.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Ukulele's happy?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Sad, something to break.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Chocolates.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: For you, job well done.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Thank you! And two bottles of scotch.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Both sad.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: And did you get the tickets?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I did! I did, indeed. Two front row center, to Paula Poundstone, Live in Poughkeepsie. Holly's favorite. I hope she doesn't call us up on stage. That would suck. "Hey, you think you can do my job better?" I don't know. "What's your name?" Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I'm really excited for Michael either way. Because if Holly chooses to be with him, he will be so, so happy. And if not, he'll be avoiding the biggest mistake of his life!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh, hey, guys! I'd like to introduce you to a new little friend of mine. His name is New Year's resolution board.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Shaaa-shut up. Hello.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: What happened? Is there a ring?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: So... high five me. We're back. To a happy... [grabs Holly's hand] look at those! Mittens. Are those a present?

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: [whispering] Come on!

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: They're warm.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: They're so fuzzy and warm! Let me feel those. Let me feel that. Put 'er there. Give me a good firm... ooh! That's a good firm handshake. You're hired! Yes, let's get right into the Anderson account, shall we? Yes, yes, right away.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hey, hey, hey. Want me to crank the thermostat up to 90, smoke her out? She can't keep those mittens on forever.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes, no, why? Stop! Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [Holly takes off mittens revealing no ring on her ring finger] Congratu-ohhh.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Wow.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh my God! That's it! That's it!

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Oh, I get it. Everybody knows about the ultimatum.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Yes, I told everyone.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [sticking both ring fingers up] Ha ha, ha ha!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Hey! [sticking up middle finger] Right back atcha, bitch!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Happy! Happy, happy, happy, happy!

Quote.Speaker: Video Michael
Quote.Text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, okay, calm down, breathe.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm trying!

Quote.Speaker: Video Michael
Quote.Text: I said breathe!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm trying!

Quote.Speaker: Video Michael
Quote.Text: Wait a second, are you listening to music?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Video Michael
Quote.Text: Shut that off!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm not listening to music!

Quote.Speaker: Video Michael
Quote.Text: Fine, just go crazy for a little while! Lookin' good! You're lookin' good. [roping Michael in] Oh, I gotcha! I gotcha! I'm pulling you back! Michael dance off!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Go! Oh, that's nice.

Quote.Speaker: Video Michael
Quote.Text: Go!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Me? Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Go!

Quote.Speaker: Video Michael
Quote.Text: Nice! We're gonna calm down later.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm good.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Oh, yeah!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh my God! [sprays champagne on Erin]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey, Dwight, I'm collecting resolution cards.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Not doing that.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Why not?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I've achieved plenty and there's no better than the best.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Drink less caffeine. That's a good one, Pam. Here's mine.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Learn to cook for one!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah. I love cooking, but I always find myself throwing out half the food that I prepare, so... two years is time to just start preparing the right amount of food for the right number of people, which is one.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Well, maybe you'll meet someone.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No, some people don't just meet someone. I'm fine with it. Really. This is not a pity party. It's not a party at all. It's just sad.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Angela.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Make time for romance!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Who's the senator?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: My boyfriend.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Oh, you mean the state senator. I'm sorry, I was confused, because you accidentally wrote 'the senator'.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Ugh.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Wait, it's that easy? That's not a resolution, that's just... something I want to do. Okay, fine. I can do that... [sticks note card on board, makes trumpet sound] My resolution is... meet a loose woman.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Oh, God.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: That's a good one.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You know what, that's my new one. I'm taking that one, too.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Awesome.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: You know what you guys should do? Go to the bookstore at lunch. There's tons of cuties and it's easy to talk to them. 'Hey, what book is that? Cool, let's hang out tonight. Sex already? Whoa...'

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: The bookstore?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: It's that easy?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I'll come with you, show you how it's done.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay, I'll drive.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: My resolution is to read more. And if someone else is driving me to the bookstore, I can eat my PB&J in the car. 2011 is coming up all Darryl.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hello! Oh, somebody's got a new phone!

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That is neat.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I got it for Christmas. I'm so out of my league here.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [imitating E.T.] E.T. phone Holly. Holly like phone?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [imitating E.T.] Holly misses old phone.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [imitating E.T.] Why?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [imitating E.T.] New phone is confusing. Gets bad reception.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [imitating E.T.] Bummer.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [imitating E.T.] Bummer.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [imitating E.T.] Reese's Pieces.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [imitating E.T.] Reese's Pieces?

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Oh, God, please stop!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I still have my old phone. This thing... indestructible. [slams phone on desk, phone breaks]

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [reaches for her cell phone] Oh, I should get this. Hey! Oh, no, don't go see that one, I want to see that together. Yeah, go see that action one. Okay. I love you, too. All right.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Holly doesn't seem to be engaged, but she's talking to AJ like she is. I can't figure it out. Do you think she's already dating a different AJ?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I don't think so.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: When you broke it off with Roy, did you still tell him you loved him?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: But you did still love him.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I'm not... I'm not going to have...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Do you love him now?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No! Just talk to her.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No. She'd just resent me. Or worse! She would think of me as her friend. [disgusted voice] Oh, hi friend! Blegh.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: I'll talk to her, Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You think she'd talk to you?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Why wouldn't she?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That's true. She's really nice. She'd talk to anybody. Why don't you bring Erin to balance you out?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: There's a plan.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: All right! We should divide up by section. I will take romance and travel.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'll take the entirety of the second floor.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I got that cutie behind the counter.

Quote.Speaker: Bookstore employee
Quote.Text: Well, if you read a lot, you should check out our e-readers. They're really neat.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Whoa, I work at a paper company, those things terrify me. They could put us out of business, you know? I heard those machines hold like, ten books at once.

Quote.Speaker: Bookstore employee
Quote.Text: Actually, it's ten thousand.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Holy [bleep], what? Let me see that. It's so light. Like a croissant.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hi.

Quote.Speaker: Customer
Quote.Text: Hi.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Welcome.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Let us know if you need anything.

Quote.Speaker: Customer
Quote.Text: Thanks.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Why did we pretend like we work here?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Is that what we were doing?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Hey, how'd you do?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Good!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Good. Real good.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah, yeah!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: We kinda nailed it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah, pretty much. But, you know, this place is kinda tapped out, so. Let's roll.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Cool.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay. What'd you get?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: A book about oceans.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, really? What else? Let me see.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: No, that's uh. Porn. Pornography. Old lady... nasty... porn.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: [whispering] Follow my lead. Hey, want some company?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Want some company?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Oh, sure. Have a seat. How were your breaks?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Oh, really good, I went to Portugal.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I went to Portugal.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Oh, wow... you went together?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: So, I've just gotta know. What's going on with you and AJ?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Nothing really happened. I mean, I know I made a big deal about this whole New Year's deadline, but um, it came and went... and, we're still together.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: You didn't break up with AJ at all? I mean, not even for a week to make him buy you a present?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: It just wasn't fair of me to give him an ultimatum in the first place. The whole thing is totally my fault. But we're going to be just fine. Just fine.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Whoa! Hold on.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I am not going back until I fulfill my resolution.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [Dwight heads toward a strip club] Oh, no, no, no. Uh-uh.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Come on, why not? I've never been in one before. I'm tired of being Mr. Perfect Role Model all the time.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I'm telling you, don't do it. I've got nothing against strip clubs, but I do have something against them at noon on a Monday. The day shift at a strip club? You can't unsee that.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Well, we can't just go back, I mean, we came out to meet women.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hey, there's a roller rink across the street! There's always chicks at the rink.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: What kind of chicks are you going to meet there?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I don't know. Single moms at a skating party. Sweet sixteen, ten year reunion parties.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Chicks fall down, need help getting back up.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Roller derby practice!

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: We're going skating.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: The goal of this meeting is to get everybody excited about their resolutions! Who's been good about their resolutions so far? Erin. Tell us about it.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Well, my goal was to learn a new word every single day. And I must say that it is going immensely.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Cool! Here's a little 'way to go' gift from Sabre. [tosses Erin a Frisbee]

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Intercepted!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Hey! Gabe.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Whoops.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Creed. I noticed you don't have a resolution on the board. What's yours?

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: I want to do a cartwheel. But real casual-like. Not make a big deal about it. But I know everybody saw it. Just one stunning, gorgeous cartwheel.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: How is it going?

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: I'm having a little trouble motivating.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: One of the hardest parts about making resolutions is keeping them. In fact, most resolutions are abandoned by February.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Or sooner.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That's not a joke.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: But that's okay. Because it's not about being perfect, it's about trying. In fact, why don't we go around and confess some of the ways that we've fudged on some of our resolutions?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Well, I said that I would eat more vegetables, and I haven't yet. But it's okay. I still have time, since last year, I ate none.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay, well, my confession is that today I had a sip of coffee. But that's fine.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Is it?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yes! Because with all of your support, by this time next year maybe I'll be down to one glass of iced tea a week.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Next year? Come-I mean, what is the point? What is the point of that? I made a resolution to floss, and I did it. 12:01, January first, BAM! Blood everywhere.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Well not all of us are Michael Freaking Scott.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What is wrong with you people? Can't you stick to anything? Erin, I want you to go to the kitchen and get me some vegetables. Creed, you say you want to do a cartwheel? Nothing's stopping you. Come on, old man, do a cartwheel!

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Well, I can't, I don't know how.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You're just gonna somersault around for the rest of your life and you know what's going to be on your tombstone? Loser.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: My tombstone's already made, thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Just do a cartwheel!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: This is all I could find.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [holding broccoli in front of Kevin] Eat it.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You don't have to do that, Kevin.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: I don't know. I'm glad this is happening. Thank you, Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Why are you eating stem first?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: This is a new food for me, how else should I eat it?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: The other way.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Can I get some cheese whiz? Or hollandaise?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No. No cheese whiz, no hollandaise, no chocolate sauce, just eat it. Come on. Here comes the airplane, there you go. Open, open, into the hanger, there you go.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh, Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Eat it. Put it in your mouth, and just eat it.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: God, I hate it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I don't care whether you hate it! You said you'd do it!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: All right!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Eat it!

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: You're killing him, Michael!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: All right, all right, shh!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: All right, I ate the fluffy part, can I be done?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Let me see if you swallowed it, open your mouth. Under your tongue. [reveals hidden broccoli, spits it out] Oh, God! You guys are pathetic.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Can I get some candy, or something?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No! You can't have any candy!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: I'll get him water.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay, Michael, just settle down.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [imitating E.T.] Holly Flax.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Yes, Michael?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [imitating E.T.] Not Michael, E.T.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: What's up?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well, I just want to talk about what happened in there.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Oh, no, Michael, I don't want to talk about it with you. I mean, I'm fine, I just... I don't want to talk about it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Holly, come on in. Thanks for coming. I thought there should be an HR rep here for this. So, Kevin and Creed, things got a little bit intense in the conference room.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: You think?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: And I wanted to apologize. These resolutions should be about you, and I made it about me, and it was none of my beeswax.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: You were super mean.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It was insensitive and I am sorry.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: It was traumatizing, Michael. I wouldn't be surprised if I never ate a vegetable again.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I really wanted you to follow through on your resolutions. The cartwheel, the veggies... I... care about you. Very much. And you loom so large in my heart that I crossed the line.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Okay, Michael, no offense, but you need to get your own life.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You're right. And I hope that we can still be friends.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: I don't think I'm there yet, Boss.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Well, I am. [hugs Michael]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay, oh! All right.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: I'm going to help you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: DJ
Quote.Text: [at the skating rink]Hey, uh. It's just you. Anything you want to hear?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Um... Dave Matthews Band. No hits! Deep tracks only.

Quote.Speaker: DJ
Quote.Text: Okay. [Ants Go Marching starts playing]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I said no hits!

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: I just feel blocked. Like I'm living, but I'm not...

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Hey, Ryan.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: How's your fart project coming?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: That's real, real classy, Kevin. Hey, was it me or you that just shoved the butt end of a pound of broccoli into my mouth because Michael told me to?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Me.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Kevin, don't! Come on!

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Oh, Pam, soda. Caffeine!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah, just a little, I have a lot to deal with today.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: [holding a pack of cigarettes] Well, if you don't have to do 'em...

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Meredith, what are you doing? I could be pregnant!

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Okay, no.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: My resolution was to get more attention.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: No, she's lying.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Hey, Ryan. [taps board, makes farting noise]

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: One, two, three. [does cartwheel] I did it! I did a cartwheel!

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: [bleep] you! [bleep] you! God!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay, that's it.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [throws resolution board away in dumpster] Lesson learned.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Sup?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hey! Where did you go?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: To the arcade.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh, cool.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Why, did you meet someone?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah, I did actually. His name is Andy, and he roller skates like a Greek god and you know what? I kinda like hanging out with him.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Right on, son.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Gentlemen.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: And where did you go?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Strip club. I was looking at the strippers at the strip club.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Right.

Quote.Speaker: DJ
Quote.Text: So, that's it, guys? If you want, I can put on the strobe.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: You want to keep this?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Do you want to keep this?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yup.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Do you want to keep this?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You can toss them.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: My resolution? I never want to make Holly cry again. Unless it's from laughing too hard. Or making love too beautifully.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: We're gonna be just fine. You know how you say something over and over and the words start to sound weird? Going to be just fine... just fine... just fine... just fine...

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I just think we need to cool things down for awhile. Yeah, a break. At least until I get back to Nashua. Yeah, I'm sure.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Look at where you're going to be doing the cartwheel. So look at where you're going to be placing your hands. So pick a spot.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Mmmhm.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You ready to do this?

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Yes, sir.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know what? I'm going to stay here as long as it takes.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: I really appreciate it, Boss.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It's about you. It's about you. Go!

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: I did it!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You did?

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: The perfect cartwheel.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: What a rush! That's all I had to do all year.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Congratulations. All right. Well, all right. See you tomorrow.
